record.title: run
record.tooltip: Runs this project as a JVM application

record.title: assemble
record.tooltip: Assembles the outputs of this project.

record.title: build
record.tooltip: Assembles and tests this project.

record.title: buildDependents
record.tooltip: Assembles and tests this project and all projects that depend on it.

record.title: buildNeeded
record.tooltip: Assembles and tests this project and all projects it depends on.

record.title: classes
record.tooltip: Assembles main classes.

record.title: clean
record.tooltip: Deletes the build directory.

record.title: jar
record.tooltip: Assembles a jar archive containing the main classes.

record.title: testClasses
record.tooltip: Assembles test classes.

record.title: init
record.tooltip: Initializes a new Gradle build.

record.title: wrapper
record.tooltip: Generates Gradle wrapper files.

record.title: assembleDist
record.tooltip: Assembles the main distributions

record.title: distTar
record.tooltip: Bundles the project as a distribution.

record.title: distZip
record.tooltip: Bundles the project as a distribution.

record.title: installDist
record.tooltip: Installs the project as a distribution as-is.

record.title: groovydoc
record.tooltip: Generates Groovydoc API documentation for the main source code.

record.title: javadoc
record.tooltip: Generates Javadoc API documentation for the main source code.

record.title: buildEnvironment
record.tooltip: Displays all buildscript dependencies declared in root project 'Snippet002'.

record.title: components
record.tooltip: Displays the components produced by root project 'Snippet002'. [incubating]

record.title: dependencies
record.tooltip: Displays all dependencies declared in root project 'Snippet002'.

record.title: dependencyInsight
record.tooltip: Displays the insight into a specific dependency in root project 'Snippet002'.

record.title: dependentComponents
record.tooltip: Displays the dependent components of components in root project 'Snippet002'. [incubating]

record.title: help
record.tooltip: Displays a help message.

record.title: model
record.tooltip: Displays the configuration model of root project 'Snippet002'. [incubating]

record.title: projects
record.tooltip: Displays the sub-projects of root project 'Snippet002'.

record.title: properties
record.tooltip: Displays the properties of root project 'Snippet002'.

record.title: task
record.tooltip: Displays all tasks of root project 'Snippet002'.

record.title: cleanEclipse
record.tooltip: Cleans all Eclipse files.

record.title: eclipse
record.tooltip: Generates all Eclipse files.

record.title: check
record.tooltip: Runs all checks.

record.title: test
record.tooltip: Runs the unit tests.

record.title: ant.build-eclipse-compiler
record.tooltip: compile project with Eclipse compiler

record.title: ant.build-refprojects
record.tooltip: Build all projects which reference this project. Useful to propagate changes.

record.title: ant.init
record.tooltip: Table example snippet2: sort a table by column

record.title: ant.init-eclipse-compiler
record.tooltip: copy Eclipse compiler jars to ant lib directory

record.tooltip: open FD Project

record.title: ant.open-src-in-fd
record.tooltip: open source in FD

record.title: ant.run
record.tooltip: execute Target

record.title: compileGroovy
record.tooltip: Compiles the main Groovy source.

record.title: compileJava
record.tooltip: Compiles main Java source.

record.title: compileTestGroovy
record.tooltip: Compiles the test Groovy source.

record.title: compileTestJava
record.tooltip: Compiles test Java source.

record.title: eclipseJdt
record.tooltip: Generates the Eclipse JDT settings file.

record.title: eclipseProject

record.title: install
record.tooltip: Installs the 'archives' artifacts into the local Maven repository.
